name: Telegraph-Bot
description: Telegram Telegraph bot to upload images

WEBHOOK.description: if your server is need web service! value = True else value = False

FORCE_SUB.description: Your force sub channel user name without [@]

ADMIN.description: Add Your User ID multiple is use space to split

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Bot Log Sending Channel (just create a private channel and add bot to admin and take channel id to add this variable) ⚠️ id startswith -100 must

DB_URL.description: Your Mongo DB URL Obtained From mongodb.com

START_PIC.description: Your Bot start cmd Pic from @Rkn_TelegraphBot
